Cicero, I don't know of any published work in which NEAT was combined 
with=
 a SOM.  However, in my classes students have used NEAT to evolve 
the func=
tion that determines how to change the weights of a SOM, both 
a regular SO=
M and a growing neural gas SOM.  (This is ina sense like 
having HyperNEAT =
determine the SOM) We found that it could improve 
performance over the sta=
ndard formulas, but we did not find any 
fundamentally new types of SOMs.  =
That is, it still worked basically 
like the usual SOM but maybe somewhat m=
ore efficiently. 

Because these were only class projects, there is still a=
 lot of room 
for exploration in this area.

ken
